title: Archeovirtual - XXIV Borsa mediterranea del turismo archeologico
description: MAPOD4D is both a platform and a framework for the development of the "multiverse of metaverses" in anthropology, history, art and culture. It is the element connecting various projects already existant, belonging to five categories: image digital elaboration, data repository, digital lab, new sensors for data acquisition, new technological methodologies.
